EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued LegalZoom Customer,
Thank you for your recent inquiry. In regards to your question, due to LegalZoom.com?s unique information saving feature, you may close your browser window at any time or click on ?Save and Exit? without losing any of your responses. Your answers have been saved through the ?Previous? and ?Save and Continue? buttons used to navigate through the questionnaire. When you are ready to proceed, simply log back onto www.legalzoom.com with your original email address and password. You will not be required to submit payment until you have completed the questionnaire and are ready to do so. If for any reason you wish not to use LegalZoom's services, you will not be charged if payment information was not entered and not submitted.
I have included a complimentary ?Estate Planning Guide? to help you become more familiar with LegalZoom's documents.
Please call us toll-free at (800) 962-7490 if we can be of further assistance. We look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team {!snippetVariable.lz_address}
